projects.title: Sales Performance Analysis
projects.description: Conducted in-depth analysis of sales data using advanced statistical methods to identify key trends and growth opportunities. Implemented automated reporting solutions that led to a 25% revenue growth.

projects.title: Advanced Excel Analytics Suite
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive analytics suite using advanced Excel features including dynamic dashboards, automated reporting with Power Query, and custom VBA solutions. Reduced reporting time by 75% and improved decision-making accuracy.

projects.title: Enterprise Data Warehouse Solution
projects.description: Architected and implemented a scalable data warehouse solution with optimized SQL queries and automated ETL pipelines. Improved query performance by 300% and enabled real-time analytics for business users.

projects.title: Interactive Business Intelligence Dashboard
projects.description: Created an award-winning suite of interactive Tableau dashboards that transformed company-wide reporting. Implemented advanced analytics with drill-down capabilities and predictive insights, leading to 40% faster decision-making.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: A dashboard that visualizes key performance indicators using interactive charts and real-time data updates.

projects.title: Machine Learning Model
projects.description: A predictive model built using machine learning algorithms to forecast sales with high accuracy.

projects.title: Sales Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Created an interactive dashboard using Power BI to analyze sales trends and customer behavior patterns across multiple regions.

projects.title: Machine Learning Price Predictor
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using Python and scikit-learn to predict housing prices with 95% accuracy.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
projects.description: Performed cluster analysis on customer data to identify key market segments using K-means clustering.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting
projects.description: Built a forecasting model for inventory management using ARIMA and Prophet, reducing overstock by 23%.
